name: One Armed Chef
description:
Play as the coolest pizza putter-togetherer around in this wacky game about covering your bases. Orders come down and it's left to you to fix them up as fast as you can, or risk being called a loser by me. Get three pizzas within the timer to win!

This was put together in a week by me and some other students at London South Bank University for our start of year game jam. We were given the theme of seasons, and as soon as we came up with this idea something clicked and I think it's safe to say we all had a blast making it.

Credits and controls are in game!
